roleset.name: impelled action
roleset.note: URGE-V NOTES: Note that this is exactly equivalent to "Ford urged the gov't and Jagholders to remove the barriers..."This verb highlights the similarity between "force" and "request",which are currently framed oppositely. One or the other will have tobe changed, eventually. (from urge.01-v)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Dealers said the multinational oil company was pressured by recent brokerage recommendations urging investors to switch into Shell Trading& Transport.
example.arg: to switch into Shell Trading& Transport

example.name: odd variant syntax
example.text: Analysts continued to speculate late last week that [Ford]-1 may try *trace*-1 to force the issue by *trace*-1 calling for a special shareholder's meeting and urging that the government and Jaguar holders remove the barriers to a full bidding contest before December 1990.
example.arg: remove the barriers to a full bidding contest before December 1990
